text: No Way Out (2005) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) for their SmackDown! brand. It took place on February 20, 2005 at the Mellon Arena in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. It was the seventh No Way Out event held by WWE. ==Matches== === WWE Championship #1 Contender's Tournament bracket === ==References== ==Other websites== *Official No Way Out 2005 website Category:2005 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Pittsburgh Category:WWE No Way Out Category:2005 in Pennsylvania Category:February events Category:21st century in Pittsburgh
title: No Way Out (2005)
